artefact: Expenses and benefits: bikes for employees

artefact.alternative_title: Employers' tax and reporting for bikes lent or hired to staff
artefact.overview: Tax and reporting rules for employers lending or hiring bicycles to employees
artefact.body:
As an employer, lending or hiring bikes to employees doesn’t count as an expense or benefit - as long as they’re available to all employees and mainly used for getting to work.

This means:

  • you don’t have to report them to HMRC
  • you don’t deduct or pay tax and National Insurance on them

Technical guidance
